books.title: Magnificent Obsession
books.author: Lloyd C. Douglas
books.summary: A brain surgeon’s secret obsession is discovered and adopted by the wealthy young man involved in his death.

books.title: The Maracot Deep
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.summary: A scientific expedition stumbles upon the remnants of Atlantis.

books.title: The Autobiography of Ma-Ka-Tai-Me-She-Kia-Kiak, or Black Hawk
books.author: Black Hawk
books.summary: The autobiography of Black Hawk, the famous leader of the Native American Sauk tribe and central figure in the Black Hawk War of 1832.

books.title: A General History of the Pirates
books.author: Captain Charles Johnson
books.summary: The lives and stories of the daring pirate outlaws who terrorized the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea in the 18th century.

books.title: The Coral Island
books.author: R. M. Ballantyne
books.summary: Three shipwrecked youths encounter delights and dangers as they attempt to escape their uninhabited tropical island paradise.

books.title: English as She Is Spoke
books.author: Pedro Carolino
books.summary: A phrasebook of unintentionally hilarious English.

books.title: Tartuffe
books.author: Molière
books.summary: A father announces his daughter will marry Tartuffe, a sanctimonious fraud and hypocrite.

books.title: The Gods of Mars
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: John Carter returns to Mars to try and determine the fate of his lost love Dejah Thoris.

books.title: The Courts of the Morning
books.author: John Buchan
books.summary: A Scottish laird foments rebellion in a South American country threatened by a hostile regime.

books.title: The Magician
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A young engaged couple meet a mysterious man who claims to have practical knowledge of the occult.

books.title: A Personal Record
books.author: Joseph Conrad
books.summary: Conrad recounts his childhood in Poland, his sailing experiences, and the work on his debut novel.

books.title: Murder in the Gunroom
books.author: H. Beam Piper
books.summary: A private detective is called upon to evaluate a gun collection that contains a dark secret.

books.title: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin
books.author: Benjamin Franklin
books.summary: Benjamin Franklin writes about his youth, adventures, and achievements.

books.title: Heretics
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: A collection of essays in which G. K. Chesterton debates the intellectuals of his day on a range of topics.

books.title: Victory Odes
books.author: Pindar
books.summary: A collection of lyric poems celebrating the triumphs of ancient Greek athletes in various sporting events.

books.title: Sunshine Sketches of a Little Town
books.author: Stephen Leacock
books.summary: A humorous account of life in the fictional small town of Mariposa.

books.title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A London lawyer investigates the relationship between a brilliant scientist and a misshapen misanthrope.

books.title: Legends of Vancouver
books.author: E. Pauline Johnson
books.summary: E. Pauline Johnson’s collection of legends and myths of the Squamish people.

books.title: Religion and the Rise of Capitalism
books.author: R. H. Tawney
books.summary: A tracing of the development of religious thought from the Middle Ages to the dawn of the Industrial Revolution.

books.title: The Cruise of the Alerte
books.author: E. F. Knight
books.summary: An English journalist sets sail in search of treasure buried on a remote desert island.
